data.current_description: Read a page of carts. Control what is returned via the `properties` query param.
data.summary_suggestion: List carts with pagination and property filtering
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve a paginated list of carts from your CRM. Use the `properties` query parameter to specify which cart properties to return in the response. Supports filtering, sorting, and pagination through query parameters. Returns a page of SimplePublicObject records containing the requested properties.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description lacks details about pagination support, return type, and filtering capabilities. Enhanced version clarifies pagination behavior, property selection mechanism, and response structure for better AI agent understanding of when to use this operation.

message: Operation 'post-/crm/v3/objects/carts/batch/upsert' has semantic quality issues: missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original description lacks clarity on input format, unique property mechanism, and response structure. data.current_summary: Create and update a batch of carts by unique property
data.current_description: Create and update a batch of carts by a unique property. Carts that don't exist will be created, while existing carts will be updated.
data.summary_suggestion: Batch upsert carts by unique property identifier
data.description_suggestion: Create or update multiple carts in a single batch operation using a unique property identifier. Carts matching the unique property value will be updated with provided data; non-matching carts will be created as new records. Accepts a batch input array with properties and optional associations. Returns a BatchResponseSimplePublicObjectWithErrors containing results and any errors encountered during processing.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks clarity on input format, unique property mechanism, and response structure. Enhanced version specifies batch input format, explains the upsert logic more clearly, identifies the response schema type, and mentions error handling for better AI agent understanding of batch operation behavior and error scenarios.

data.current_description: Retrieve a batch of carts by ID (`cartId`) or unique property value (`idProperty`).
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve a batch of carts by ID (`cartId`) or unique property value (`idProperty`). Specify which properties to return using the `properties` query parameter. Returns a batch response containing retrieved carts and any errors encountered during processing.

data.current_description: Update a batch of carts by ID (`cartId`) or unique property value (`idProperty`). Provided property values will be overwritten. Read-only and non-existent properties will result in an error. Properties values can be cleared by passing an empty string.
data.description_suggestion: Update a batch of carts by ID (`cartId`) or unique property value (`idProperty`). Provided property values will be overwritten. data.current_summary: Create and update a batch of carts by unique property
data.current_description: Create and update a batch of carts by a unique property. Carts that don't exist will be created, while existing carts will be updated.
data.description_suggestion: Create or update a batch of carts using a unique property identifier. Carts matching the unique property will be updated with provided values; non-matching carts will be created as new records. Accepts a batch input object with cart data and returns a batch response indicating success or failure for each record. Supports partial updates and returns HTTP 207 if some records fail.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate, but description lacks critical details about input format, response structure, and error handling. Added information about unique property matching logic, batch response format, partial update support, and HTTP 207 status code for partial failures to improve AI agent understanding of batch operation behavior.
